text: Boys Town is a 1938 American drama movie directed by Norman Taurog and starring Spencer Tracy, Mickey Rooney, Leslie Fenton, Gene Reynolds, Edward Norris, Addison Richards, Jonathan Hale, Bobs Watson, Frankie Thomas. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 5 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1939. It was followed up by 1941 movie Men of Boys Town. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1938 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Taurog Category:Movies set in Nebraska
title: Boys Town (1938 movie)
